sentence_zh_TW: 新鮮的食物不僅對身體健康有益，還讓人感到精神焕發。
sentence: Fresh ______ is not only beneficial for health but also revitalizes the spirit.

sentence_zh_TW: 當天氣晴朗時，我們喜歡在外面野餐，享受自然的美好。
sentence: When the weather is nice, we love having picnics ______ to enjoy the beauty of nature.

sentence_zh_TW: 她給了我一個驚喜，讓我在生日那天感到非常特別。
sentence: She gave me a ______ that made me feel very special on my birthday.

sentence_zh_TW: 在運動時不小心受傷是很常見的，因此要特別注意安全。
sentence: It's common to get ______ during sports, so it's important to pay extra attention to safety.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個團體的活動安排得井然有序，以確保每個成員都能參與其中。
sentence: The activities of this ______ are organized in an orderly fashion to ensure every member can participate.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了保持安全，乘客在飛行中的椅背必須保持直立。
sentence: For safety, the passenger's seat ______ remain upright during the flight.

sentence_zh_TW: 她用籃子收集了各種新鮮的水果，準備在晚餐時使用。
sentence: She gathered various fresh fruits in a ______ to use for dinner.

sentence_zh_TW: 在農場裡的豬非常可愛，總是讓遊客們流連忘返。
sentence: The ______ on the farm are very cute and always leave visitors wanting to stay longer.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這場比賽中，他以第二十名的成績結束，雖然他並不滿意。
sentence: In this competition, he finished in ______ place, although he was not satisfied with it.

sentence_zh_TW: 這道新菜需要嘗試多次才能完美，經驗是非常重要的。
sentence: This new dish requires you to ______ multiple times before it's perfect; experience is crucial.

sentence_zh_TW: 經過一天的繁忙工作後，躺在床上徹底放鬆真是太美好了。
sentence: After a long day of busy work, it feels so good to lie down on the ______ and completely relax.

sentence_zh_TW: 在漫長的步行後，腳會感到疲憊，因此需要適當的休息。
sentence: After long walks, your ______ may feel tired and thus need appropriate rest.

sentence_zh_TW: 這幅畫作展現了真實的情感，讓觀者深受感動。
sentence: This artwork displays a ______ emotion that deeply moves the viewers.

sentence_zh_TW: 士兵們在艱難的情況下展示了驚人的勇氣，讓所有人都感到敬佩。
sentence: The ______ displayed incredible bravery in the face of adversity, earning the admiration of all.

sentence_zh_TW: 那位藝術家的畫作展現了人們看待世界的獨特角度，讓人耳目一新。
sentence: The artist's work shows a unique ______ at the world that is refreshing to see.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個晚上的綜藝節目在電視上吸引了數百萬觀眾的注意。
sentence: The variety show tonight on ______ attracted millions of viewers' attention.

sentence_zh_TW: 當風吹拂時，海的波浪會輕柔地拍打在沙灘上，發出悅耳的聲音。
sentence: When the wind blows, the waves of the ______ gently lap against the shore, creating a soothing sound.

sentence_zh_TW: 進一步的學習對於個人成長和職業發展至關重要，特別是在不斷變化的世界中。
sentence: Further ______ is essential for personal growth and professional development, especially in an ever-changing world.

sentence_zh_TW: 蜂蜜不僅美味，還具有多種健康益處，是自然界的珍貴禮物。
sentence: Honey is not only delicious but also has various health benefits, making it a precious gift from nature.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個烹飪班上，我們將學習如何捲起新鮮的麵團，製作美味的糕點。
sentence: In this cooking class, we will learn how to ______ fresh dough to make delicious pastries.
